required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of SI-F019 in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Clinical Study on the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of SI-F019 Recombinant Human Bivalent ACE2-Fc Fusion Protein Injection in a Single Dose in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetic properties of a single intravenous administration of SI-F019 recombinant human bivalent ACE2-Fc fusion protein injection in healthy participants, and provide a basis for the design of subsequent clinical trials.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 29 days after the first dose of SI-F019
primary_outcome.description: Number of Adverse Events and Seriuos Adverse Events

overall_official.affiliation: Shanghai Public Health Clinical Center Ethics Committee Approval Letter

facility.name: Shanghai Public Health Clinical Center Ethics Committee Approval Letter
